jobs.title: University of Utah Health
jobs.description: As part of a major academic medical center, I was able to work on my first truly large-scale projects and find my niche as a front-end developer and occasional designer.

jobs.title: Richter7
jobs.description: Working at a small, nimble agency was a great way to gain valuable experience working on a variety of design and development projects, often requiring creative problem solving.

jobs.title: Utah Central Credit Union
jobs.description: In addition to managing the public-facing website, I managed the company intranet, shot and edited training videos, built and sent email blasts, and created motion graphics shown in branch locations.
